dataIdInfo.idPurp: The initial outputs from the morphological mapping tools sometimes may need additional post-processing. This toolset currently contains two tools for this purpose. After such post-processing steps, the new outputs may be more accurate in the mapping results and thus are more suitable for the subsequent attribute generation and classification.
dataIdInfo.idAbs:
This toolset currently contains two tools. Please see detailed metadata from each tool.

  • Merge Connected Features Tool: This tool merges polygon features that are connected through shared points or borders.

  • Connect Nearby Linear Features Tool: This tool connects nearby linear bathymetric low features.

searchKeys.keyword: This toolset contains accessory tools that may help the morphological mapping.
